short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly identify websites by adding an indicator to differentiate them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you add an indicator to websites to quickly differentiate them depending on their URL and provided configuration.

Key Features:
- Support several rules to check whether a marker should be added to a website (e.g., contains words, RegEx, starts with, ends with, CIDR, etc.).
- Support different indicator positions (e.g., top left, top right, bottom left, bottom right, etc.)
- Support different indicator shapes (e.g., ribbon, triangle, etc).
- Support to export and import rules.
- Support to add a colored marker to the website's favicon.
